description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(680).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,678,0,-1).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1,13,677,8814]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 678*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..30]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jan 19 2014
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
